=============
field_caption
=============

.. js:attribute:: field_caption

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Field class </refs/client/field_api>`


Description
===========

**Field_caption** attribute specifies the name of the field that appears to 
users.

See also
========

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`

:doc:`Fields </programming/data/fields>`

:doc:`field_name <at_field_name>`
